Class CalculationData

java.lang.Object
task01.CalculationData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CalculationData extends Object implements Serializable
The CalculationData class stores a number and its representations in different numeral systems: binary, octal, and hexadecimal. It implements Serializable to support object serialization.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • CalculationData

      public CalculationData()
      Constructs a new CalculationData object with the default value of 0. Initializes numeral system representations accordingly.

    • CalculationData

      public CalculationData(int number)
      Constructs a new CalculationData object with the given number. The default values for numeral system representations are initialized as zero.
      Parameters:
      number - the decimal number to be stored and converted

  • Method Details

      Parameters:
